website_summaries.verdict: Disney does it again. This fun car seat is inexpensive, looks cute, and comes with a few extras that make it a great deal.
pros: Can be used rear-facing from 5 to 40 lbs
and forward facing from 22 to 50 lbs
Great harness adjustments with 6 different heights and 3 buckle locations
Provides good leg room when rear-facing
cons: The harness straps can be difficult to adjust

customer_reviews.title: We were just in an accident...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this car seat for almost a year now. My son loves the Mickey's on it but today it was our to a real life test. I was t-boned directly in my son's door. Air bags deployed, car had to be towed and my one year old son is ok. He was properly restrained in this car seat and the first words out of the ambulance was the car seat did it's job. I immediately ordered another one if these.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Cute...however
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice seat. However, it’s not for everyone. This car seat is different in the sense that it is not designed to fit the height and weight requirements that it claims there is no way. My daughter is only 25.5 inches tall and her head is basically to the top of the car seat shell already. Weight wise she is 18 pounds and is 14 months old and doesn’t sit comfortably in it at all as she is all slumpy looking in the seat. Don’t let the cute mickey/Minnie design fool you and get your moneys worth and go with a better car seat, as there is not a lot of cushioning for accident protection either.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a second car seat i have a extended to fit as the main car seat but its heavy and bulky so i wanted something lighter and not so big i use it in my moms 2 door mustang and it fits perfect baby is 11 months and she loves it the only bad thing is it doesnt have the buckle holders and i need to read the instructions on the anchors cause its one long piece where my graco is 2 individual ones this one does have the clip holders to hold the anchor clips on the car seat
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great little seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little carseat. Daughter loves it and it fits better in seat compared to our last one. Only two minor complaints: 1. There's very little leg room when rear facing and we have about 2 years to go until front facing. The bottom buckle sort of presses into her thighs because it's set further back in the seat than most models but it doesn't leave a mark and she doesn't complain. 2. Bottom buckle/red button can be very hard to release at first but you get used to it. Otherwise love the cup holders, head cusion is awesome bonus, love how easy it is to install, easy to clean and very easy to adjust straps!
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: Is this a real Disney Product?
customer_reviews.text: This would be fine if I thought it was an authentic Disney product. The picture shows that the word minnie would be on the bottom of the car seat but I did not have that on ours. It is false advertising and may be a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!  I would recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 month old granddaughter and it was easy to install (I used the front facing installation). She looks very content and comfy. I bought one for my son to have as their spare seat and they plan on using it facing back which I think will be a little squishy for her legs. Good purchase! I would recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mellow

customer_reviews.title: A little to big
customer_reviews.text: I think the car seat is beautiful but it's a little too big. I drive a Chevy Avalanche and it's crammed in the backseat. It has a lot of safety features and she fits down deep in it besides come up really high so that's a good thing. The good thing it's going to last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money!!!!!! I bought 2 for my daughter's & they are so pretty & good quality!!! Not to mention the fact that I spent $106 on both yet on Walmart the cheapest one cost $120!! So I totally saved money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Contreras

customer_reviews.title: works for it's price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 18 months just needed a rear facing car seat for the next 6 months. I had no intentions of spending $200+ on a car seat now and spend another $200+ in 6 months so I bought this. It's cute and serving its purpose but if your child is tall for their age you may not want this because it does not allow for extra leg room. The straps do not glide easy so you have to double and triple check that the 5 point harness is actually snug on your child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe, not sturdy, terrible, twisted bottom latch connector that won't tighten.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy feeling, very lightweight. Not padded. Liner doesn't come off easily. The base latch belt arrived unusably twisted and you cannot straighten it out because the clip is not removable. Even if I could straighten it out, the cheap, cruddy way it is attached to the base and the fact their aren't 2 separate latch connections on each side means their weird Y latch belts come from the far side so the seat moves around, the strap doesn't tighten to make a short, sturdy, safe connection. This is a the only seat I have ever put my hands on that made no sense and felt 'dangerous'. I am terribly disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice carseat, depending on use
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice carseat. However I have trouble fitting it in certain cars. I bought this carseat as an extra for my husbands car or my moms etc but I have a hard time fitting it in the back seats the only seat it can fit in is the middle. Also the carseat advertises for smaller babies to be able to fit but the carseat doesn't provide much head support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line quality
customer_reviews.text: I have seen reviews saying this is not a Disney product and the fabric is cheap. Well, this is absolutely a Disney product. The fabric is even great quality and makes it very easy to wipe off. We are very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy with room to grow.
customer_reviews.text: I like that my daughter's legs are not dangling especially on long car rides. There is support that keeps her legs comfortable. It is not super cushiony but not super hard either. I like the cup holders, those are great. She puts her sippy cup in one and her pacifier in another. The mini mouse ear pillow thing does not stay in place so I bought a separate one to support her head when she falls asleep. I am very happy with this purchase and so is my baby.
customer_reviews.author: rodrigbl

customer_reviews.title: Oh Minnie!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit. It is easy to install in the car. We currently use this as a rear facing seat and the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the overall size is large. It rubs against the front seat even after moving it forward. That is only a temporary issue. We all know how fast the kids grow! It will be turned around to front facing in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Zaners Gma

customer_reviews.title: I love this seat great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size it’s big so as the baby gets older. She can still fit in the seat. Adjustable seat belt to move up or down. Very deep curved shaped hugged seat comfortable for a baby. You get two cup holders possibly for snacks and a drink. It’s perfect not a dull color in sight and easy to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: India W

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly! GREAT PRICE FOR AN “OK” PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: Wobbles when turning left and right with the straps intact as they should be. Is it supposed to do that? I WOULD NOT BUY THIS AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: MSMELXX

customer_reviews.title: Big and roomy. Easy to get  baby in and out.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my grand daughter. Both she and Mommy are happy to have such a roomy seat. She can stretch out and the sides are curved to protect her head. It is also cute. 5 ***** !!!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not super soft
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of padding or comfort to this. The mickey ears come off really easy so we had to stop using them. If your baby is kinda skinny there is excess extra space on their sides.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for limited use.
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is very cute and easy to install but theres a couple of annoying issues with it. For one the cover pops off all the time, theres no hooks or clips to keep it in place. The second issue is if you use it as a rear facing seat it sits very awkwardly where you kind of have to wonder if the base is stable in an everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: CoolStoryBro

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Quality Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this car seat. We bought 2 for both of our vehicles. It’s easy to install and our son loves it. It’s roomy and has 2 cup holders on the side. Plus, it’s Mickey! Who doesn’t love Mickey?!?!
customer_reviews.author: kpa_31mom

customer_reviews.title: Mickey seat!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for mom’s car and one for dad’s car. It is roomy for our 2 year old. It’s simple to install. The 2 cup holders are a great feature. We will have these seats for a few years. Our son loves Mickey.
customer_reviews.author: Judith J. Knieling

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE PURCHASE! SERIOUSLY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It looks 10 times better in person. I was a bit skeptical because of the price, but WOW! My daughter really loves it and the quality is strong. Super cute carseat for baby girls!
customer_reviews.author: Yamelsi Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! It’s so cute and so easy to install! We’ve had a lot of car seats and some have anchors that I can’t even figure out but this one was very easy, it’s also lighter than others.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.. Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this car seat. It’s adorable. It was a lot harder to install then previous car seats but once it’s in your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: GMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable for rear facing almost 2 year old. We bought this to put in grandma’s car while visiting her and it’s been perfect. The two cup holders are great to hold things in easy reach and the Minnie Mouse piece comes off easily if you don’t want it. It’s not the sturdiest car seat but it was great while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: K. Richey

customer_reviews.title: So far I’m happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great car seat. Easy to install, I used the seat belt instead of the latch system. Also very easy to adjust the straps for a growing baby.
customer_reviews.author: GirlNotInMexico

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it ,she says "it's wreally comfy" I love it daddy thank you So no complaints here had ot for a while now its comes clean easy too great material... Thank You Sincerely, BRANDON WILLIAMS
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Safe and cute
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute. I have my niece 30% of the time and i needed a car seat of my own. Granted, there are probably more comfortable car seats out there with memory foam cushions (spoiler, this one doesn't) she at least is safely buckled in and loves seeing mini mouse as she's being buckled in.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: PADDING DOES NOT FIT BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Padding does not fit correctly. Clearly was cut smaller than the actual seat itself and won’t stay wrapped around. Waste of money. Only plus is that it was super easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: So nice!! Highly recommend. Perfect for our 1 year old and she still has room to grow into it. We bought 2 because they're so nice.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight affordable convertible car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Easily maneuvered from car to car. Light weight. Fabric is soft yet durable. This is by far the easiest seatbelt to adjust that I’ve dealt with. Rear facing can be a little awkward at first but you get the seat in place in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa weaver

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and so does my son! The recline is great and his head doesn't slouch at all when he sleeps. It's so comfy, he's usually asleep within 5 minutes. The cup holders are a little small, but good for holding some crackers or gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Patterson

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and light. But there is NO way this carseat is safe. This carseat does not stay put and is VERY easy to move back and forth when using the anchors or seat beat. Used for one day and 100% returning. This should not be allowed to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Kadikades94

customer_reviews.title: great car seat
customer_reviews.text: very easy install and also my second purchase because i gave the first to my nephew!!!! love this also would recommend to get cover for the actual seats because it will scratch leather
customer_reviews.author: lamanda langkilde

customer_reviews.title: In Love With This Carseat!!
customer_reviews.text: This carseat it extra big compared to the previous seat we bought. She has plenty of room to grow and will be used for several years. Price was Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sharp

customer_reviews.title: a+
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for my granddaughters 4yrs and 1 yr . There great . They love them . Shipping extremely quick
customer_reviews.author: Angela Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Looks great my one year old little girl loves it just as described thanks so much fast shipping too 100% A+
customer_reviews.author: Michael Minter

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Cute & easy to carry around in the airport. It’s light enough to carry on your back without feeling weighed down. I didn’t like that it didn’t have the two clip attachments like Graco does, but it’s simple for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Minnie Mouse carseat
customer_reviews.text: Very vary fast delivery. Love the Minnie Mouse carseat. Great quality and comfortable for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great overall.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, easy to adjust as baby grows, very cute. But it is a bit hard to tighten down when installing when rear facing and the crotch button is hard to get both clips out at the same time. Usually one side comes undone then you have to fight to get the other side out. All in all good purchase besides it’s small quirks. Very happy overall with my purchase. I bought 2 one for our car one for grandmas 😊😂
customer_reviews.author: Rebeckah Arin

customer_reviews.title: Baby car seat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my son he uses Uber all the time and baby seat is very light easy to install and light to carry around my son really loves it
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Doria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this carseat! She only wants to ride with my husband because he has this in his car. It's also easy to install and adjust for fit.
customer_reviews.author: megn_bailey

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute design. Easy to install if you know the trick to installing a car seat properly. My toddler really likes this seat and seems comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Car seat
customer_reviews.text: Depends on your car for leg room. I have a compact car so the baby's feet rest to the tip of the car seat and that's with the passengers seat moved forward as much as the rider can take.
customer_reviews.author: Brob

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! My 3 month old is swimming in It at the moment but nice to know she can grow into it!
customer_reviews.author: Monet

customer_reviews.title: Material doesn't breathe too hot in summer
customer_reviews.text: The material is not for a baby in the summer holds heat not breathable at all! It's like a nylon the kind if u have rough hands and touch it, it snags hate the feel
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable as the child grows
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift. They liked it. Cute theme. I liked that it is adjustable as the child grows.
customer_reviews.author: Armommi

customer_reviews.title: Minnie Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! Needed an extra seat for husbands car, fits perfect! Plus my little one LOVES minnie, so she loves her seat! Spacious, 2 cup holders, easy to install. Both rear & forward facing compatibility, which is a major plus!! Price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: super cute design
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected, super cute design, easy to put the straps in the places needed for my daughter. I like that this is front facing and rear facing as my daughter is still a bit small but like her to be in something other than an infant car seat so this worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these car seats! When my daughter turned one I got her the solid pink and it was super cute. I ordered the pink one with black bows and received it the next day. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy & fun
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the easiest car seat to install. No complicated crazy straps! Its on the larger side but I have big kids so im happy with it! Its also incredibly light weight & super fun. My son loves the mickey mouse headpiece it comes with!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Moen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. We have a smaller vehicle so car space is normally cramped, but this car seat still managed to fit right in. Installation is fairly straight forward and the leg space the seat gives is great for my kids. I might have to get another one so both kids have the extra leg room. This car seat is extremely good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my niece she loves the Minnie Mouse look and the cup holders work great for the bottles a little to small for sippy cups though
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great seat.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in my 2017 Jeep Wrangler, which is nice because there is limited leg room. Good design but the mouse “pillow” came out when I adjusted the straps and it will no longer stay intact.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! We have a '16 chevy equinox, and it's perfect in the back! Great amount of room!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: ... that I did not need help installing and was easy to use in securing and releasing active toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is for Nanas car and I wanted something that I did not need help installing and was easy to use in securing and releasing active toddler. Nice item, good, price and will keep him facing backwards as long as possible
customer_reviews.author: Mistydtoo

customer_reviews.title: overall great for price
customer_reviews.text: great carseat. Personally think it could 7se more padding for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: came on time and in good shape Update
customer_reviews.text: My 15 mth old gson loves it! So roomy..came on time and in good shape Update..I bought one for me for now a 22 mth old.I have arthritis in my hands and it is so hard to release the red button! I have ordered the aid to help with this and hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: LeMann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: First baby and she grew out of the infant seat and we read great reviews and she loves it. The double cup holders are great for people who have children who love to eat so you put their cup in one and puffs in the other or a toy lol
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra yates

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. I purchased this seat for use in my vehicle for my granddaughter. It's ok for occasional use, but all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a get. My daughters first big seat, and I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: April👑

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality car seat at a pretty inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality car seat at a pretty inexpensive price. When it comes to safety, you never want to skimp, and I certainly don't feel like that is the case. The Mickey print is a hit with the kids too!
customer_reviews.author: Fixy

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has supported for her head when she falls to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved the seats, but can’t use- too wide
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work three in a row seats. The cup holders add a lot of width. Too bad because the kids lived them.
customer_reviews.author: Anjella

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute safe carseat great price. I had read in some of the reviews that was hard install but if you read the instructions my husband had it out of box and in the car in less than 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: crystal gayle marsh

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grand child, super cute!! Installed easily and sends to be holding up just fine after 2 months
customer_reviews.author: KS Sybert

customer_reviews.title: So and so.
customer_reviews.text: We got it when my baby was 8 months. He has it not at 15 months . We love it. Easy to assemble! I would have love if his head had sides to adjust . But its wide on top.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana aranda

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough for a growing child.
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat, my grandaughter sits deep enough that her legs dont hang off, that us in the rear facing position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this car seat! Baby girl LOVES it too! She is always so happy to “sit with Minnie!”
customer_reviews.author: Chotty

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter to use when we travel. It's lightweight and easy to use. It fit through the scanner at the airport. Just make sure you get a travel bag when transporting it at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Army Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1year old. He’s very tall! Very durable but lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than what we expected, our 15 month old granddaughter fits perfectly with lots of room! Very easy to install, and when she’s ready for front facing, BOOM! We just turn it around! She loves having her juice in the cup holder next to her, and she enjoys having her snacks in the other cup holder! So glad we bought this, and for the price, we got a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good thing you don't take newborns a bunch of places.
customer_reviews.text: Cute seat. Will work eventually, HOWEVER my 7lb 7oz 19.25in newborn was too small for the seat as the straps will not tighten enough to keep her safe. Luckily I was able to borrow an infant seat from a friend to bring my baby home. But if I had to take baby anywhere right now I would be out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her car seat I can tell for the look of her face she just sits and her smile is amazing definitely a good product
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it so much so that he cried when I took him out of it. He's only a year old, but he has so much room to grow with it and keep it for a long while. I am so glad I purchased it! It looks better in person as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Renée

customer_reviews.title: And the weight and comfort of the seat makes for easy movement of the seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat gives me comfort in knowing that my Daughter's head does not slump down dangerously forward while she sleeps. The price point is amazingly low for the product quality and craftmanship. And the weight and comfort of the seat makes for easy movement of the seat... when necessary. This is my second seat, as I have one for each car. And my Daughter loves the seat as it has plenty of room and a deep seat construction which envelops her whole body safely and sound. Just buy it! You will be pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super excited
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with the bow but it did the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat !!! Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful carseat. We bought it for our granddaughter and our daughter was surprised when it arrived. Fast shipping. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Host

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! My daughter loves it she is 11 months and loves sitting in it. She use to hate her infant car seat but this car seat is so comfortable and has a lot of room. I really recommend this car seat it is really nice for its price I was surprised how nice it was.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Latch system
customer_reviews.text: This car seat did not come with a latch system like advertised. And I can’t find anyone to contact regarding this. It only buckles rear facing with a seatbelt since I don’t have this latch system it’s wiggly and unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Der

customer_reviews.title: Seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat so much bought three of them
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Roomy and the padding is great. My granddaughter loves this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this seat bought 2 for my baby boy (one for each vehicle.) Will be buying 2 more for my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: amanda lynn

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! So affordable and will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my granddaughter she loves it and safety it looks greet and price was good too
customer_reviews.author: vicky  schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The leg clip is too short and sits in between the baby's legs. And the Minnie pillow is cute but is just in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Malcom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wet spacious and pretty. Used as a backup for my parents to pick up in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: roomy
customer_reviews.text: my baby turns 2 and I got this for her dose the job just fine
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Krobi

customer_reviews.title: Car seat
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes !!! This has a lot of room and super cute . Best Buy and price matches my budget .
customer_reviews.author: Angie M

customer_reviews.title: Very cute my granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice car seat, works as designed. Of course if you want to better one the cost is $160
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Rabb

customer_reviews.title: It was just ok
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have any type of instruction. It wasn't even wrapped. Just thrown down in the box
customer_reviews.author: Dennis beckner

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute! My Grandson looked at it and kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute! My Grandson looked at it and kept saying Mickey, Mickey, Mickey!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chair!
customer_reviews.text: The design is terrible! We have two cars and the chair doesn’t fit none of them. If you install it in the middle, the chair does not have support, and if you install it behind one of the seat, you will not have any space for the person... This car seat is the worst!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Belmonte

customer_reviews.title: Padding didnt fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: The padding doesn't fit right, leaving a gap on the upper back between the side protection. Even when I try pulling the material back and around the edge, it barely makes it over then it slowly let's go. It looks like it was just cut a tad bit too small. If I could just get the padding replaced, I would update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight, easy to use and put in car. I have bought two so far for each child. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. At the 6 month mark, it’s holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect airplane carseat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 18month old for flying! Light enough to haul around airports and easy to buckle into airplane and car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Erinda

customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean and easy to put in. My daughter loves this car seat!

customer_reviews.title: Baby carseat

customer_reviews.author: debbie sullivan

product_meta.title: Disney Baby Apt 50 Convertible Car Seat, Mouseketeer Minnie
product_meta.description:
Color:New Mouseketeer MinnieTravel is more fun with Disney along for the ride. Rear-facing to 40 pounds and forward-facing to 50 pounds, the The Disney Baby Apt 50 Convertible Car Seat keeps them safer during every stage with Side Impact Protection. There's also six harness heights and three buckle locations for the best fit as they grow.


With kids in the car, messes happen. Now, thanks to the easy-to-clean car seat pad, there's no need to stress. The pad comes in a wide range of styles and colors, all of which remove from the seat and are both machine washable and dryer safe. A thorough wash is just a machine cycle away.

If your chosen vehicle happens to be an airplane, the Disney Baby Apt 50 has got you covered. Certified for use on aircraft, it gives your child a familiar seat during the flight. The lightweight and compact design also get you through the airport without weighing you down. Two integrated cup holders make sure your copilot has plenty of room for drinks or a snack during the ride, whether on ground or up in the air.

The Disney Baby Apt 50 is proudly made by Cosco in Columbus, Indiana. Made by American families for American families
feature_bullets: Extended use lets kids ride longer: Rear facing 5 40 pounds and Forward facing 22 50 pounds
Seat pad is machine washable and dryer safe
5 point harness with up front adjustment
6 harness heights and 3 buckle locations allow for the best fit for growing children
